#summary Exercise 2: Image Enhancement
= Introduction =

Image enhancement operations were applied on a given image.
  * Image Negative
  * Contrast Stretching
  * Gray Level Slicing
  * Dynamic Compression
  * Histogram Equalization


= Details =

A workbench with graphical user interface was developed for this exercise.
Check out the [http://code.google.com/p/cmsc291/downloads/list downloads ] of the project .

= References =

  * Digital Image Processing by Gonzalez and Woods
